entities.name: georgie
entities.description: Georgie is the person being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is the one whispering to Georgie.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the person who is feeling holy and is being spoken to by his brother Fred.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is George's brother who is looking terrified and asking if George's mind is affected.

entities.name: saintlike
entities.description: Saintlike is the state that George claims to be in.

relationships.description: Fred is concerned about George's well-being and asks if his mind is affected.
Mrs. Weasley is speaking to Georgie in a whisper.
George claims to be in the state of being holy.
